Name: New Century Galaxy Legend
About the game: New century Galaxy legend is currently a barrage game. Players strive for the maximum number of seconds to survive by avoiding barrages. The type of barrage will be switched every other period of time. At the same time, with the increase of survival time, the generated barrage speed will be faster and faster. After players are hit by a barrage, their survival time will be ranked with the player records around the world, so let's keep creating and refreshing survival records! If you are a hardcore game enthusiast, strong reaction ability is an important skill. New century Galaxy legend may help you improve this ability. The operation method of the game is very simple. Players only need to operate the aircraft to avoid the barrage. For new players, maybe 10 seconds is a milepost. Through continuous practice, players' flight time will be improved. tons of barrages are coming, can you hold on for 30 seconds? Let's start the challenge NOW! Game control Move: '←', '→', '↑', '↓' Confirm: 'space' Return: 'ESC'
